  • Method Details

    • getPromotionList

      public void getPromotionList(List<Promotion> promotions)
      Function used when generating the list of ongoing promotions. Iterates through the list of promotions, and prints them out.
      Parameters:
      Promotion - This is the list of promotions.

    • updatePromotion

      public void updatePromotion(List<Promotion> promotions, List<MenuItem> menuItems)
      Function that performs the update on a particular promotion in the list of ongoing promotions. Updates current promotion by adding new menu items. Updates current promotion by deleting existing menu items. Updates the descriptions of existing promotion. Updates the price of the existing promotion.
      Parameters:
      promotions - This is the list of promotions.
      menuItems - This is the list of menuItems.

    • createPromotion

      public void createPromotion(List<Promotion> promotions, List<MenuItem> menuItems)
      Function to create promotion to be added to the list of promotions Creates promotion by specifying the name, description, price and choice of menuItems.
      Parameters:
      promotions - This is the list of promotions.
      menuItems - This is the list of menuItems.

    • deletePromotion

      public void deletePromotion(List<Promotion> promotions)
      Function to delete ongoing promotion from the list of promotions. Specify which promotion to be deleted from the list Deletes the promotion specified.
      Parameters:
      Promotion - This is the list of promotions.
